skills.name: FEINT
desc: • 3 hits of physical damage to an enemy.
• 75% Chance to grant Perfect Hit status to random ally on each hit.

skills.name: PRESENCE
desc: • Increase ATK of allies for 2 turns.
• 25% Chance to grant Critical Strike Chance.

skills.name: THRILL
desc: Raises the ATK of all allies at the start of battle. Gain Ascension for 2 turns if Vanish is present at the start of your turn.
